file_content.text: Once, we were mortals, and we dreamed of mortal things. Now we are beyond man, woman, or Sith.
Once, we were six. On Darvannis, you bled and hollowed us, and we became five.
Once we were six; on Darvannis, the Republic slew our brother, and we became five.
Once, we were conquerors, but now we have seen our true path. For this, we thank you.
I have enough blood on my hands to last a lifetime. We don't have to be at war.
I don't want to fight you.
You can't win against the Republic and the Empire. All you're doing is prolonging suffering. It doesn't have to be like this.
This conflict is futile.
We enact the cycle.
Dread Masters: You have committed crimes against sentient life and the Galactic Republic. I am asking you to stop the bloodshed and surrender!
Surrender now.
Why?
Listen to me. You want your own territory--I get that. You want the Empire gone--I completely get that. We've got common ground here.
Let's negotiate a deal.
But you have nothing to offer.
What do you mean, you "thank me"? Why are you doing all this?
What are you talking about?
You want to thank me? Stop hiding in your fortress. Let's settle this.
Come here in person, coward.
You do not realize how small a part you play.
Come thank me in person. You'll get the same reply I gave your man on Darvannis.
I beat one of you already.
His death was our revelation.
Before our brother tasted oblivion, we had prepared to spread terror across the galaxy. We would build an endless dominion under our leadership.
Coruscant overgrown with our devices. Homes and families slick with blood. Billions overcome with fear and hatred.
That day will still come. But it will not end there.
We felt our brother's doom on Darvannis. We felt peace. When we have enslaved the galaxy, slaughter will follow.
Birth. Pain. Fear. Death. The cycle of existence.
Oblivion will overtake all that is. At the end, we too will taste death's solace.
You're doing all this so you can die and take the rest of the galaxy with you?
You want to die?
Yes.
For generations, the Jedi Order has helped its members find peace. Let me help you, and no one has to die.
If you want peace, I can help.
Death is always the final step.
If you're looking for peace, murdering people won't help. I've fought long enough to know that.
Killing won't bring you peace.
Then you have not seen the cycle's end.
Let me sum this up: You want to die, and you want to take the galaxy with you. It's crazy, but it doesn't change my plans.
You're suicidal murderers.
But now you die understanding.
Coruscant and every other world will taste the depths of fear.
Even now, our servants ready ships to leave Oricon and spread terror. You will try to stop them, too late--and you will despair.
When you realize that you are nothing, the darkness shall welcome you.
Sergeant Trila? If you can hear this, I've got the computer core but we may have a problem. I'll explain shortly.
